content:
I just finished listening to the Changelog Interview with WarpStream, titled “Reinventing Kafka on object storage”. It was a good listen and I’ve heard good things about WarpStream in general.

Just read this article that says that WarpStream’s pricing calculator was grossly flawed. I don’t know much about Kafka pricing. Anyone with experience willing to share their take?

https://blog.2minutestreaming.com/p/the-real-apache-kafka-cost
A related post from another Kafka product: https://streamnative.io/blog/how-we-run-a-5-gb-s-kafka-workload-for-just-50-per-hour
